about_the_game:
Support Future Games Select and give your standard Toilet Plunger a cosmetic upgrade!

Direct from the International Prison Control Systems 1973 product catalog:
The Executive model Manual Obstruction Suppressor.

Key Features:



  • Coated Steel Nameplate.
  • Natural Rubber Bonnet.
  • 18oz Full Maple Handle.
  • Industrial Rated.


Break out in style with this fashionable piece of custodial equipment!

This item becomes available immediately.
Enable/Disable from the Options->Video Menu.
detailed_description:
Support Future Games Select and give your standard Toilet Plunger a cosmetic upgrade!

Direct from the International Prison Control Systems 1973 product catalog:
The Executive model Manual Obstruction Suppressor.

Key Features:



  • Coated Steel Nameplate.
  • Natural Rubber Bonnet.

  • Industrial Rated.


Break out in style with this fashionable piece of custodial equipment!

This item becomes available immediately.
Enable/Disable from the Options->Video Menu.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual-core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeaon HD2600/3600 (Graphic Drivers: nVidia 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Snow Leopard 10.6.3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

name: Half-Life: C.A.G.E.D. - Executive Plunger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 500 mhz processor
  • Memory: 96 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 32mb video card
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Potato acceptable.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1000 mhz+ processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb+ video card
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

short_description: Upgrade your standard Toilet Plunger to The Executive model! Support the Half-Life: C.A.G.E.D. modification with this alternately styled (awesome) weapon!
